content.title: Checking the Status of Service
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor canvas, under the Invoke Service, select Callback.
  2. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Network section, select Loading Indicator.
  3. From the right pane of the Action Editor, set the Loading Indicator to Dismiss.
  4. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Condition section, select If.
